job_description:
Senior Software Engineer - Full Stack

We are seeking a talented Senior Software Engineer to join our rapidly growing engineering team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both frontend and backend development, with a focus on building scalable web applications.

Required Skills:
- 5+ years of experience in software development
- Expert-level proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript and React.js
- Strong experience with Node.js and Express.js
- Experience with SQL databases (preferably PostgreSQL)
- Proven track record of building RESTful APIs
- Understanding of cloud services (AWS/GCP)

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with GraphQL
- Knowledge of containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
- Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines
- Experience with microservices architecture

Education:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
- Master's degree preferred

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement scalable web applications
- Lead technical discussions and mentor junior developers
- Collaborate with product managers to define technical requirements
- Maintain and improve existing codebase
- Participate in code reviews and technical documentation
resume:
JOHN SMITH
jsmith@email.com | (555) 123-4567 | github.com/jsmith

SUMMARY
Senior Software Engineer with 7 years of experience building scalable web applications. Proven track record of leading teams and delivering high-impact projects in fast-paced environments.

EXPERIENCE

Tech Solutions Inc. | Senior Software Engineer | Jan 2020 - Present
- Led development of microservices-based e-commerce platform serving 1M+ users
- Architected and implemented RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js
- Reduced page load time by 40% through frontend optimization techniques
- Mentored 5 junior developers and conducted regular code reviews
- Technologies: React, TypeScript, Node.js, PostgreSQL, AWS

Innovate Corp | Software Engineer | Mar 2017 - Dec 2019
- Developed and maintained customer-facing web applications using React.js
- Implemented CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins, reducing deployment time by 60%
- Collaborated with UX team to improve application accessibility
- Technologies: React, JavaScript, Python, MySQL, Docker

EDUCATION
Master of Science in Computer Science
Stanford University | 2017

Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
University of California, Berkeley | 2015

SKILLS

Frameworks: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, Django

Other: RESTful APIs, GraphQL, Microservices, Agile/Scrum

- 500+ GitHub stars, 50+ contributors

Cloud Migration Tool

- Reduced migration time by 70% for client projects
- Featured in AWS community showcase
justification: Perfect match for the role. Exceeds required experience (7 years vs 5+), has all required skills (JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Node.js, PostgreSQL), plus preferred qualifications (GraphQL, Docker). Master's degree is a bonus. Demonstrated leadership and mentoring experience aligns with senior role requirements.
